summary.span: 表示 对象集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和方法，可以添加和从集合中移除单个控件。The , , and methods enable you to add and remove individual controls from the collection. 此外可以使用或方法来添加或从集合中移除所有控件。You can also use the or methods to add or remove all the controls from the collection. 如果可以确定是通过将传递到控件集合的成员方法。You can determine if a is a member of the collection by passing the control into the method. 若要获取的位置的索引值在集合中，将传递到控件方法。To get the index value of the location of a in the collection, pass the control into the method. 可以将集合复制到一个数组，通过调用方法。The collection can be copied into an array by calling the method. ## Examples 以下代码示例中删除从派生的类的如果它是集合的成员。The following code example removes a from the of the derived class if it is a member of the collection. 该示例需要您已创建、 一个，且至少一个上控制。The example requires that you have created a , a , and at least one control on a . 控件添加到控件，并控件添加到。The controls are added to the control, and the control added to the . 单击该按钮，将名为单选按钮`radioButton2`已从。When the button is clicked, the radio button named `radioButton2` is removed from the . [!code-cpp[ControlCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CPP/controlcollection.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[ControlCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CS/controlcollection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ControlCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/VB/controlcollection.vb#4)]

summary.span: 将指定的控件添加到控件集合中。

span.span: Adds the specified control to the control collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法，可添加到控件集合的末尾的对象。The method allows you to add objects to the end of the control collection. 您还可以添加新通过使用集合的对象方法。You can also add new objects to the collection by using the method. 若要删除之前添加，请使用， ，或方法。To remove a that you previously added, use the , , or methods. > [!NOTE] > 一个只能分配给一个一次。A can only be assigned to one at a time. 如果已添加到另一个控件之前删除该控件中的另一个控件的子级。If the is already a child of another control it is removed from that control before it is added to another control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将添加到派生的类的。The following code example adds a to the of the derived class . 该示例需要您已创建控件和一个控制上。The example requires that you have created a control and a control on a . 单击按钮时，控件添加到面板的。When the button is clicked, a control is added to the panel's . [!code-cpp[ControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CPP/controlcollection.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CS/controlcollection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/VB/controlcollection.vb#2)]

span.span: The specified control is a top-level control, or a circular control reference would result if this control were added to the control collection.

span.span: Adds an array of control objects to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中所含对象`controls`数组追加到集合的末尾。The objects contained in the `controls` array are appended to the end of the collection. 可以使用方法来快速添加一组而不是手动添加每个集合的对象集合使用方法。You can use the method to quickly add a group of objects to the collection instead of manually adding each to the collection using the method. 若要删除之前添加，请使用， ，或方法。To remove a that you previously added, use the , , or methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加两个对象添加到派生的类的。The following code example adds two objects to the of the derived class . 该示例需要您已创建控件和一个控制上。The example requires that you have created a control and a control on a . 单击按钮时，两个控件添加到面板的。When the button is clicked, two controls are added to the panel's . [!code-cpp[ControlCollection#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CPP/controlcollection.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[ControlCollection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CS/controlcollection.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ControlCollection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/VB/controlcollection.vb#3)]

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method to ensure that the controls are added to the collection.

summary.span: 从集合中移除所有控件。

span.span: Removes all controls from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用方法从父控件中移除的控件的整个集合。You can use the method to remove the entire collection of controls from a parent control. 若要从集合中移除单个控件，请使用或方法。To remove an individual control from the collection, use the or methods. > [!IMPORTANT] > 调用方法不会从内存中删除控件句柄。Calling the method does not remove control handles from memory. 必须显式调用方法可避免内存泄漏。You must explicitly call the method to avoid memory leaks. 若要添加新对象到集合中，使用或方法。To add new objects to the collection, use the or methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例中移除所有中的对象派生的类的。The following code example removes all the objects in the of the derived class . 该示例需要您已创建、 一个，以及至少一个其他控制。The example requires that you have created a , a , and at least one other control on a . 其他控件添加到控件，并添加到。The other controls are added to the control, and the added to the . 单击该按钮，在窗格中所包含的所有控件都将都从中。When the button is clicked, all the controls contained in the panel are removed from the . [!code-cpp[ControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CPP/controlcollection.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CS/controlcollection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/VB/controlcollection.vb#1)]

para.span: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以确保所有控件从集合中都移除。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method to ensure that all the controls are removed from the collection.

span.span: Removes the specified control from the control collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当删除从控件集合后面的所有控件都将上都移集合中的一个位置。When a is removed from the control collection, all subsequent controls are moved up one position in the collection. 您还可以删除通过使用方法或通过使用中的所有控件的删除方法。You can also remove a by using the method, or remove all controls by using the method. 若要添加新对象到集合中，使用或方法。To add new objects to the collection, use the or methods. ## Examples 以下代码示例中删除从派生的类的如果它是集合的成员。The following code example removes a from the of the derived class if it is a member of the collection. 该示例需要您已创建、 一个，和一个或多个上的控件。The example requires that you have created a , a , and one or more controls on a . 控件添加到控件，并控件添加到。The controls are added to the control, and the control is added to the . 单击该按钮，将名为单选按钮`radioButton2`已从。When the button is clicked, the radio button named `radioButton2` is removed from the . [!code-cpp[ControlCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CPP/controlcollection.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[ControlCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CS/controlcollection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ControlCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/VB/controlcollection.vb#4)]

para.span: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以确保从集合中移除该控件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method to ensure that the control is removed from the collection.

summary.span: 在指定的索引位置从控件集合移除控件。

span.span: Removes a control from the control collection at the specified indexed location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当删除从控件集合后面的所有控件都将上都移集合中的一个位置。When a is removed from the control collection, all subsequent controls are moved up one position in the collection. 您还可以删除通过使用前面添加或方法。You can also remove a that you previously added by using the or methods. 若要添加新对象到集合中，使用或方法。To add new objects to the collection, use the or methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例中删除第一个中派生的类的如果集合计数大于零。The following code example removes the first in the of the derived class if the count of the collection is greater than zero. 该示例需要您已创建、 一个，以及至少一个其他控制。The example requires that you have created a , a , and at least one other control on a . 其他控件添加到控件，并控件添加到。The other controls are added to the control, and the control added to the . 单击按钮时，包含在面板中的第一个控件已从。When the button is clicked, the first control contained in the panel is removed from the . [!code-cpp[ControlCollection#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CPP/controlcollection.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[ControlCollection#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CS/controlcollection.cs#5)] [!code-vb[ControlCollection#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/VB/controlcollection.vb#5)]

summary.span: 将集合中的指定子控件的索引设置为指定的索引值。

span.span: Sets the index of the specified child control in the collection to the specified index value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调用时，由引用`child`参数移动到指定的位置`newIndex`和其他中引用进行重新排序以适应移动。When is called, the referred to by the `child` parameter is moved to the position specified by `newIndex` and the other references in the are reordered to accommodate the move. 具有的索引值为零的控件为在 z 顺序的顶部，更高版本的数字是更接近于底部。The control with an index value of zero is at the top of the z-order, and higher numbers are closer to the bottom.

span.span: The control is not in the .
